description: Vaccinations & Immunizations | Rite Aid Vaccine Central
cleaned_text: From COVID-19 to the Flu, schedule the whole family's immunization appointments at Rite Aid today Rite Aid pharmacists are unique because they understand the importance of personalized care. On top of receiving a comprehensive education needed to meet state licensing requirements, all our pharmacists are professionally certified to provide immunizations. What sets our pharmacists apart from the rest are their daily interactions with you, our customers. Are you ready to get an immunization at Rite Aid, but want to make sure that a Rite Aid pharmacist can administer it for you? Rite Aid is required to adhere to state law when administering vaccinations. And each state has its own unique requirements. To find out what immunizations are available and what age or other limitations may apply in a specific state please select the relevant state below. Keep your employees healthy and safe with a vaccine clinic. Schedule an on-site clinic or request vouchers redeemable at any Rite Aid pharmacy. * Vaccines available while supplies last. Availability and age restrictions apply in some states. See pharmacist for details.
